hero.title: Lumos Grade
hero.subtitle: Upload your assignment, AI will follow up on your thoughts, point out blind spots, and help you clarify and understand your arguments.
hero.heroImageAlt: Student writing assignment with AI smart grading assistance

philosophy.label: Philosophy
philosophy.title: The Tension of Dialectic
philosophy.description: True insight is often formed in the tension of differing opinions. We introduce <1>'Productive Resistance'</1>, enabling AI not just to grade, but to constantly question and challenge, inviting you to defend your views and refine your reasoning in dialogue, transforming grading into a two-way thinking training.

socratic.title: Socratic Inquiry
socratic.desc: — Not just telling you what's wrong, but asking you why

dialectic.title: Dialectic Exchange
dialectic.desc: — Accompanying you to clarify and complete your thoughts

methodology.label: Methodology
methodology.title: Three Steps from Idea to Feedback

featureExtraction.title: Understanding How You Think
featureExtraction.desc: AI identifies your current claims, evidence, and inference relationships as the basis for follow-up questions and responses.

ruleBased.title: Follow-up Questions Based on Standards
ruleBased.desc: Every piece of feedback is grounded; you can understand where the problem lies and answer again with your own thinking.

iterative.title: Iterative Refinement in Feedback
iterative.desc: Each response becomes the starting point for the next round of thinking, allowing the assignment to be not just graded, but rethought.

growth.label: Growth
growth.title: A Mirror of <1>Thought</1>
growth.description: Lumos Grade is not just a grading tool, but a mirror that reflects the thinking process. By recording your <1>'thoughts'</1> and revised viewpoints during the dialogue, we visualize the implicit thinking process. What you see is not just a score, but how ideas are clarified step by step.

mirroring.title: See Your Thinking Blind Spots
mirroring.desc: — See where you tend to overlook or get confused in your thinking

declaration.title: Anchor Your Stance
declaration.desc: — Helps you clearly express your claims, making them easier to be questioned

archaeology.title: Review Thought Process
archaeology.desc: — See how your ideas have been revised and improved

cta.title: Ready to Have Your <1>Ideas</1> Questioned?
cta.subtitle: Join those who pursue understanding rather than scores, and let every piece of feedback promote your thinking.

footer.quote: "Lumos Grade is a tool for thought, not just for efficiency."
footer.author: — Inspired by Microsoft Research
